snippet: In a shared space, Max Lamb is showing his unique take on the speckled composite material known as terrazzo, alongside a furniture collection made of fiberglass from Faye Toogood.
abstract: In a shared space, Max Lamb is showing his unique take on the speckled composite material known as terrazzo, alongside a furniture collection made of fiberglass from Faye Toogood.

headline.main: At the Milan Furniture Fair, Two British Designers Reinvent Passé Materials
